features: DEEP CLEANSING FABRIC RINSE: With 3X more odor removal power it replaces your liquid fabric softener and acts as a laundry detergent booster to help remove stubborn odors and residues deep within fabrics

SOFTER, BRIGHTER FABRICS: Unlike traditional liquid fabric softener that can deposit residues on clothes, Downy Rinse and Refresh rinses away residues for fresher, softer and brighter fabrics vs detergent alone
REMOVES STUBBORN ODORS and RESIDUES: The breakthrough laundry odor remover rinses away residues and odors better than detergent alone
FRAGRANCE FREE FORMULA: Downy Rinse and Refresh fights stinky odors, but is still gentle on sensitive skin
EASY TO USE: Just pour Downy Rinse and Refresh in your liquid fabric softener dispenser or directly in the rinse cycle
SAFE ON ALL FABRICS: Works with your laundry detergent to remove odors from activewear, baby clothes, towels and more
body.description: Tired of stubborn odors that never seem to wash out of your clothes? Introducing Downy Rinse & Refresh laundry odor remover and fabric softener, a breakthrough laundry odor remover that helps rinse away the smelly residue trapped within fabric fibers. While traditional liquid fabric softener can deposit residues on fabrics trapping odors in, Downy Rinse & Refresh contains 3X more odor removal power* that acts as a laundry detergent booster to help remove residues and odors. This leaves fabrics fresher, softer, and brighter than before. No more reappearing odors. Downy Rinse & Refresh fragrance free formula leaves your clothes smelling clean while still being gentle on sensitive skin. Smelly activewear, musty towels, even forgotten laundry in your washing machine overnight… Downy Rinse & Refresh detergent booster strips odors away in one wash* without the use of vinegar or other homemade laundry hacks. And because it’s free of dyes and heavy perfumes, this odor remover is gentle on sensitive skin and perfect for baby clothes, too. Plus, it’s easy to use! Just pour it into your liquid fabric softener dispenser or directly into the rinse cycle. Want to add additional fresh scent? Add Downy Scent Booster Beads to your routine for extra freshness. *Vs. detergent alone. *Vs. the leading value brand in 3 washes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us The agitation, spinning, and heat of the laundry process can damage clothes at the fiber level. But Downy Fabric Softener smooths and strengthens fibers to protect clothes from the damage of the wash, helping them maintain their shape. By smoothing fibers, Downy reduces the friction between them that causes them to break and leads to pills and fuzz. And when fibers break, colors appear duller, so using Downy also helps keep your clothes from fading.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as Advertised on any Fabric
reviews.reviewText: It has not damaged clothes that one would normally not use a fabric softener. Got rid of new Jean smell. It doesn't soften clothes but that's not what it's advertised to do. It works well for exactly what it says

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm super sensitive to smells. I bought this to use on my bed linens and workout gear.The linens had some kind of slight musty odor.This stuff works! And it's unscented! And it doesn't make me itch from.any kind of residue.Very happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Gets grease stains out of clothes, but I don’t like the price. Especially for the size it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh and clean
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is wonderful. Smells great and gets rid for orders. Love it for linens and towels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Meh, didn’t help, didn’t hurt
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know that this really does anything. Our clothes were getting clean before and didn’t stink. I don’t know that it does anything for static, I don’t think it’s designed for that. Also I feel they are intentionally vague on the amount to use so that you use far more than you need. And it’s expensive for what it is. It also suds if you shake it, so clearly something is getting left behind.I have to use hypoallergenic everything these days, and I will say it doesn’t seem to bother me in the free and gentle version.Overall, I think this is probably a waste of money. Instead of buying this, spend the money on really good laundry detergent and maybe some Borax for the tough loads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for those with tender, sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: I like the fresh feeling in my clothes; softening without the oily feeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Healthy steps in the home
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the only product you can buy recommended for laundry that doesn’t have and harsh chemicals, dyes, or fragrances. If ur not using this u might as well make your own laundry soup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this product it makes my clothes smell fresher than usual I wish they came out with coupons to buy more though
